tweet: Abra plans to suspend trading of Monero (XMR), Zcash (ZEC), and Dash (DASH) starting at 2 pm PST on Jan 15, 2021.  Due to current regulatory uncertainty surrounding the status of XMR, ZEC, and DASH our custody partner will no longer be supporting these assets.  https://t.co/UDth1pXiqa
FTX has added a perpetual futures contract for XMR!

Monero won't go away with exchange delistings. Instead, trades are being conducted using p2p trading tech without *any* US government oversight. No KYC, no limits. Delistings hurt investigations.  XMR/BTC has been the highest volume pair on the Bisq DEX for years.

Monero use is up 5x since the 2018 price peak. Very few cryptocurrencies can say this: not Bitcoin, not Ethereum, definitely not Litecoin, not BCH. Monero is the best fundamental trade that exists today.
